RelatedSentence: Just when we thought we were making the first steps toward transparency in fracking - in the form of EPA indicating it might require frackers , at long last , to reveal the names of the chemicals they blast into the ground in order to extract oil and gas - three GOP state senators in North Carolina stepped in to put a stop to all that .

Just when we thought we were making the first steps toward transparency in fracking - in the form of EPA indicating it might require frackers , at long last , to reveal the names of the chemicals they blast into the ground in order to extract oil and gas - three GOP state senators in North Carolina stepped in to put a stop to all that .
